mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.yaid yaid, t.zddwid zddwid, t.jzfqid jzfqid, t.zqbw zqbw, t.zqdj zqdj, t.qhyy qhyy, t.gyjzhzwxx gyjzhzwxx, t.zhcs zhcs, t.rswz rswz, t.qhbwgd qhbwgd, t.rsmj rsmj, t.zqms zqms, t.zqsdyj zqsdyj, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_YA_ZQSD t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_YA_ZQSD t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_ZQSD(uuid,yaid,zddwid,jzfqid,zqbw,zqdj,qhyy,gyjzhzwxx,zhcs,rswz,qhbwgd,rsmj,zqms,zqsdyj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzfqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqbw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qhyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gyjzhzwxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zhcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rswz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qhbwgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{rsmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zqms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqsdyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_YA_ZQSD t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_ZQSD(uuid,yaid,zddwid,jzfqid,zqbw,zqdj,qhyy,gyjzhzwxx,zhcs,rswz,qhbwgd,rsmj,zqms,zqsdyj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.yaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yaid,#{item.zddwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zddwid,#{item.jzfqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzfqid,#{item.zqbw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zqbw,#{item.zqdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zqdj,#{item.qhyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qhyy,#{item.gyjzhzwxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gyjzhzwxx,#{item.zhcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zhcs,#{item.rswz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} rswz,#{item.qhbwgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE} qhbwgd,#{item.rsmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} rsmj,#{item.zqms,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zqms,#{item.zqsdyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zqsdyj,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), yaid = VALUES(yaid), zddwid = VALUES(zddwid), jzfqid = VALUES(jzfqid), zqbw = VALUES(zqbw), zqdj = VALUES(zqdj), qhyy = VALUES(qhyy), gyjzhzwxx = VALUES(gyjzhzwxx), zhcs = VALUES(zhcs), rswz = VALUES(rswz), qhbwgd = VALUES(qhbwgd), rsmj = VALUES(rsmj), zqms = VALUES(zqms), zqsdyj = VALUES(zqsdyj), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
